name: Recess Traders
description:
Trade your way to the top during recess.

This game is an entry to the GMTK Jam 2018.

The topic was "Genre without mechanic" so we set out to make an RPG with a traditional ATB battle system, but no actual fighting.

Try to make your dreams come true, starting from only a paper clip.

Art: Sean Cruz

Audio: Philipp Bicking

Programming: Nils Ole Timm
